paper.title: Planning in Polynomial Time
paper.venue: Proceedings of the international workshop on Expert systems in engineering : Principles and applications: Principles and applications
paper.abstract: This paper describes a polynomial-time, O(n3), planning algorithm for a limited class of planning problems. Compared to previous work on complexity of algorithms for knowledge-based or logic-based planning, our algorithm achieves computational tractability, but at the expense of only applying to a significantly more limited class of problems. Our algorithm is proven correct and complete, and it always returns a minimal plan if there is a plan at all.
